class.name: StoreProductPaymentMode
class.brief_description: The payment modes for subscription offers that apply to a transaction.

method.name: get_free_trial
method.description: Returns a payment mode representing a free trial.

method.name: get_pay_as_you_go
method.description: Returns a payment mode where the user pays as they go (e.g. monthly for 3 months).

method.name: pay_up_front
method.description: Returns a payment mode where the user pays the entire amount up front.

members.member: The localized description of the payment mode.
